synonyms: vraje—in Vṛndāvana; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; sarva-aiśvarya-prakāśe—manifestation of His full opulence; pūrṇa-tama—most complete; purī-dvaye—in Dvārakā and Mathurā; para-vyome—and in the spiritual world; pūrṇa-tara—more complete; pūrṇa—complete.
translation: "Kṛṣṇa is complete in the spiritual sky [Vaikuṇṭha]. He is more complete in Mathurā and Dvārakā, and He is most complete in Vṛndāvana, Vraja, due to His manifesting all His opulences.

purport.content: This is confirmed in the following three verses from the Bhakti-rasāmṛta-sindhu (2.1.221-223).
